name: List reactions for a commit comment

previews.name: squirrel-girl
previews.description:
**Note:** APIs for managing reactions are currently available for developers to preview. See the [blog post](https://developer.github.com/changes/2016-05-12-reactions-api-preview) for full details. To access the API during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
  application/vnd.github.squirrel-girl-preview+json

```

params.name: content
params.description: Returns a single [reaction type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/v3/reactions/#reaction-types). Omit this parameter to list all reactions to a commit comment.

params.name: per_page
params.description: Results per page (max 100)

params.name: page
params.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

name: Create reaction for a commit comment

previews.name: squirrel-girl
previews.description:
**Note:** APIs for managing reactions are currently available for developers to preview. See the [blog post](https://developer.github.com/changes/2016-05-12-reactions-api-preview) for full details. To access the API during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
  application/vnd.github.squirrel-girl-preview+json

```

params.name: content
params.description: The [reaction type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/v3/reactions/#reaction-types) to add to the commit comment.

description: Create a reaction to a [commit comment](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/v3/repos/comments/). A response with a `Status: 200 OK` means that you already added the reaction type to this commit comment.

name: Create reaction for an issue

name: List reactions for a team discussion

previews.name: echo
previews.description:
**Note:** The team discussions API is currently available for developers to preview. See the [blog post](https://developer.github.com/changes/2018-02-07-team-discussions-api) for full details. To access the API during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
application/vnd.github.echo-preview+json

```

previews.name: squirrel-girl
previews.description:
**Note:** APIs for managing reactions are currently available for developers to preview. See the [blog post](https://developer.github.com/changes/2016-05-12-reactions-api-preview) for full details. To access the API during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

params.name: content
params.description: Returns a single [reaction type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/v3/reactions/#reaction-types). Omit this parameter to list all reactions to a team discussion.

params.name: per_page
params.description: Results per page (max 100)

params.name: page
params.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

description: List the reactions to a [team discussion](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/v3/teams/discussions/). OAuth access tokens require the `read:discussion` [scope](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/apps/building-oauth-apps/understanding-scopes-for-oauth-apps/).

params.name: content
params.description: The [reaction type](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/v3/reactions/#reaction-types) to add to the team discussion.

description: Create a reaction to a [team discussion](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/v3/teams/discussions/). OAuth access tokens require the `write:discussion` [scope](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/apps/building-oauth-apps/understanding-scopes-for-oauth-apps/). A response with a `Status: 200 OK` means that you already added the reaction type to this team discussion.

previews.description:
**Note:** APIs for managing reactions are currently available for developers to preview. See the [blog post](https://developer.github.com/changes/2016-05-12-reactions-api-preview) for full details. description: OAuth access tokens require the `write:discussion` [scope](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/apps/building-oauth-apps/understanding-scopes-for-oauth-apps/), when deleting a [team discussion](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/v3/teams/discussions/) or [team discussion comment](https://developer.github.com/enterprise/2.14/v3/teams/discussion_comments/).
